channel.title: PI item slot problem
channel.description:
Whenever i wear staff of light, chaotics, etc. It goes into the head slot..
I've tried adding if (wearId == $$$) { slot "weapon"; something like that and it didn't work pls help idk if it is in itemassistant.java, etc.
http://gyazo.com/d33836cb5f9aba51e0d704e32cbd71bd

item.title: PI item slot problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“shank beast, post:3, topic:480495”]ya, i did exactly what you said. And it still goes into head!

if (item == 18349) {
return “weapon”;
}[/quote]
Check the code in the item def in your client.

Read full topic

item.title: PI item slot problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“shank beast, post:1, topic:480495”]Whenever i wear staff of light, chaotics, etc. It goes into the head slot…

I’ve tried adding if (wearId == $$$) {
slot “weapon”; something like that and it didn’t work
pls help idk if it is in itemassistant.java, etc.

http://gyazo.com/d33836cb5f9aba51e0d704e32cbd71bd[/quote]
search “Item.playerBody(item)” in itemAssistant.java
look for where it says something like:

		if (item == 1052) {
			return "cape";
		}

add this under the last bracket:

		if (item == ID) {
			return "weapon";
		}

Read full topic
